check_email.title: Check your email
check_email.subtitle: Check your inbox at {{ userEmail }} to verify your email and continue with your free account.
check_email.subtitle_no_account: Heads up! You don't have a Veriam account yet. Check your inbox at {{ userEmail }} to verify your email and continue with your free account.

confirmation.title: Your email was verified
confirmation.subtitle_success: You can now log in to your account

profile.title: My profile
profile.subtitle: View and manage all your information in one place.

my_access.title: My access
my_access.subtitle: All subscriptions, licenses and access policies you have available to access products of Veriam providers.

subscriptions.subtitle: Your subscriptions from Veriam providers to access their products.

access_licenses.subtitle: Access licenses assigned to your organization by Veriam providers to access their products.

policies.subtitle: Policies and roles assigned to you by Veriam providers to access their products.

overview.title: Users
overview.subtitle: Manage the users of your organization, including inviting new users, enable/disable and deleting users, password resets, and assigning access rights

overview.title: Groups
overview.subtitle: Groups allow you to easily manage a set of users. Users can belong to multiple groups

overview.title: Organizational units
overview.subtitle: Organizational units are used to represent your organizational hierarchy. Users can only belong to one organizational unit

overview.title: Access licenses
overview.subtitle: All access licenses available to your organization
